messages.message:
hmm they're looking to deploy in early nov so we can stick to 22.08. however, if our team recommends 22.10 or find that it's more stable, i'm certain they'll also be willing to wait a week or two

the question i'm leading up to essentially: if a customer has the option of 22.08 and 22.10, are we confident in recommending 22.10 to the customer instead of 22.08?
